subject: Re: HELP! : (HtmlPage)button.click(); : No response comes after clicking
messageBody:
try this link :-
http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html#forum

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "ahuja405" <ahuja405@y...> wrote:
>
> I am writing an application which Log's into a website and after
> successfull login I need to parse the response. The website on which I
> am loging in has the following HTML code
>
> #################
> <HTML>
> <HEAD>
>
> <LINK REL="stylesheet" HREF="./../Objectstore/General/DVPortal.css"
> TYPE="text/css">
> <LINK REL="stylesheet" HREF="./../Objectstore/General/DVCustomer.css"
> TYPE="text/css">
> <TITLE>PROVISO: Login</TITLE>
>
> <SCRIPT>
> <!--
> function com_sssw_AgpPage()
> {
> }
>
> var Page=new com_sssw_AgpPage();
> function
>
com_sssw_submit(name){document.forms[0].elements['AgEvtSrc'].value=name;document.forms[0].submit();}Page.submit=com_sssw_submit;
> function com_sssw_onBodyLoad(){
> Page.Username=document.forms[0].elements["S18_"];
> Page.Password=document.forms[0].elements["S20_"];
> Page.Button1=document.forms[0].elements["S22_"];
> Page.Username.focus();
> }
> //-->
> </SCRIPT>
> </HEAD>
> <BODY BACKGROUND="./../Objectstore/Images/bg_login.gif"
> onload="com_sssw_onBodyLoad();"><FORM
> ACTION="/pvquebec/SilverStream/Pages/DVLogIn.html" NAME="AG"
> METHOD="POST"><INPUT TYPE=HIDDEN NAME="AgEvtSrc" VALUE=""><INPUT
> TYPE=HIDDEN NAME="AgStateCode" VALUE="2">
> <P><TABLE BORDER=0 CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=0 WIDTH=285>
> <TR>
> <TD VALIGN=TOP NOWRAP>
> <P><DIV CLASS="welcomeText" STYLE="margin-top:100px;
> font-weight:bold;">Welcome to reporter
> </DIV><DIV CLASS="welcomeText" STYLE="width:200px; ">Please enter your
> username and
> <BR>password in the fields to the right.
> </DIV></TD>
> <TD VALIGN=TOP NOWRAP>
> <P>
>
            </TD>
> <TD VALIGN=TOP NOWRAP WIDTH=50%>
> <P><DIV CLASS="loginText" STYLE="margin-top:100px; ">Username
> </DIV><DIV CLASS="loginText" STYLE="margin-top:17px;">Password
> </DIV></TD>
> <TD ALIGN=CENTER VALIGN=BOTTOM WIDTH=50%>
> <P><DIV STYLE="margin-top:3px; "><IMG
> SRC="./../Objectstore/Images/logo_yournamehere.gif"
> BORDER=0></DIV><DIV STYLE="margin-top:25px; "><INPUT NAME="S18_"
> TYPE="TEXT" VALUE SIZE="20"> </DIV><DIV STYLE="margin-top:10px;
> "><INPUT NAME="S20_" TYPE="Password" VALUE SIZE="20"></DIV><DIV
> STYLE="margin-top:10px; " ALIGN="left"><INPUT NAME="S22_"
> TYPE="SUBMIT" VALUE="Login"></DIV></TD>
> </TR>
> </TABLE></DIV>
> </FORM></BODY>
> </HTML>
> ########################
>
> The code which I am using to login is shown below
>
> ##########
>
> public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
> final WebClient webClient = new WebClient();
> final URL url = new
> URL("http://147.149.164.50/pvquebec/SilverStream/Pages/DVLogIn.html");
> final HtmlPage page = (HtmlPage)webClient.getPage(url);
> final HtmlForm form = page.getFormByName("AG");
> final HtmlSubmitInput button =
> (HtmlSubmitInput)form.getInputByName("S22_");
> final HtmlTextInput user =
> (HtmlTextInput)form.getInputByName("S18_");
> final HtmlPasswordInput pwd =
> (HtmlPasswordInput)form.getInputByName("S20_");
>
> WaitingRefreshHandler tmp = new WaitingRefreshHandler(10);
>
> webClient.setRedirectEnabled(true);
> webClient.setRefreshHandler(tmp);
>
> user.setValueAttribute("1141942");
> pwd.setValueAttribute("yb4114uq");
>
> HtmlPage page2 = (HtmlPage)button.click();
>
> }
> }
> ##########
>
> The programme seems to be stuck on the last line. It keeps on waiting
> for response and nothing happens. Any idea where I am wrong?
>
> Rgds,
> Amit
>
